36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Masruq said:"I entered upon 'Aishah and she invited me to eat. She said: 'Whenever I eat my fill of food I want to cry and begin crying.' He said: "I said : 'Why?' She said: 'I remember the circumstances under which the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) parted from the world. By Allah! He would not eat his fill of bread and meat twice in a day

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَعِيشَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَهْلِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Subsistence of the Prophet (ﷺ) And His Family
